Content.Content: Twitter] ;LinkedIn] Facebook] A Jallow, S BugielWe study the impact of Stack Overflow code evolution on the stability of prior research findings derived from Stack Overflow data and provide recommendations for future studies. We systematically reviewed papers published between 2005–2023 to identify key aspects of Stack Overflow that can affect study results, such as the language or context of code snippets.
